data.title: Welcome to Ewing Christian College, Prayagraj. An autonomous constituent college of University of Allahabad. A Christian Minority College of the Church of North India, Diocese of Lucknow.
data.meta_description: Official website of ECC Prayagraj. A prestigious Autonomous Minority Institution, a reputed Centre of Learning and a Constituent College of the University of Allahabad. Ewing Christian College is one of the best undergraduate and Post graduate colleges of India.
data.text:
Principal's Message

I am overjoyed to welcome you to this web-site of Ewing Christian College and I wish to convey the passion and enthusiasm that both staff and students bring to all that they do here, making this College a wonderful place to learn. This College is renowned for the outstanding holistic education that we provide, since we have a strong focus on student academic progress and achievement.

Chairperson's Message

It is my utmost honour to interact with you through this website as the Chairperson of Ewing Christian College Society which manages the Ewing Christian College which is a Christian Minority Institution of the Church of North India, Diocese of Lucknow and also an constituent autonomous college of the University of Allahabad. I want to take this opportunity to welcome you all to the Website
